name: JLPT N5 Reading Quiz
instructions: Type the reading of the below word in Hiragana!

cards.meaning: to hear, to listen to, to ask
cards.question: 聞く

cards.meaning: two days, second day of the month
cards.question: 二日
飲む
cards.meaning: to drink; to gulp; to swallow; to take (medicine), to smoke (tobacco), to engulf; to overwhelm, to keep down; to suppress, to accept (e.g. demand, condition), to make light of; to conceal
three days, third day of the month
cards.question: 三日

cards.meaning: six days, sixth day of the month
cards.question: 六日

cards.meaning: eight days, eighth day of the month
cards.question: 八日

cards.meaning: four days, fouth day of the month
cards.question: 四日
お兄さん
cards.meaning: older brother; elder brother, (vocative) young man; buddy; fella; laddie

cards.question: お姉さん
cards.meaning: elder sister, (vocative) young lady, miss (referring to a waitress, etc.), ma'am (used by geisha to refer to their superiors), older girl (no relation)

cards.question: お茶
cards.meaning: tea (usu. green), tea break (at work), tea ceremony

cards.question: 風
cards.meaning: wind; breeze; draught; draft, manner; behaviour; behavior, cold; influenza, method; manner; way; style, appearance; air, tendency, folk song (genre of the Shi Jing), wind (one of the five elements)

cards.question: 乗る
cards.meaning: to get on (train, plane, bus, ship, etc.); to get in; to board; to take; to embark, to get on (e.g. a footstool); to step on; to jump on; to sit on; to mount, to reach; to go over; to pass, to follow; to stay (on track); to go with (the times, etc.), to take part; to participate; to join, to get into the swing (and sing, dance, etc.), to be deceived; to be taken in, to be carried; to be spread; to be scattered, to stick; to attach; to take; to go on

cards.question: 仕事
cards.meaning: work; job; business; occupation; employment; vocation; task, work

cards.question: 元気
cards.meaning: lively; full of spirit; energetic; vigorous; vital; spirited, healthy; well; fit; in good health

cards.question: 初めて
cards.meaning: for the first time, only after ... is it ...; only when ... do you ...

cards.question: 取る
cards.meaning: to take; to pick up; to harvest; to earn; to win; to choose, to steal, to eat; to have (a meal), to remove (one's glasses, etc.), to compete (in sumo, cards, etc.); to play

cards.question: 口
cards.meaning: mouth, opening; hole; gap; orifice, mouth (of a bottle); spout; nozzle; mouthpiece, gate; door; entrance; exit, speaking; speech; talk (i.e. gossip), taste; palate, mouth (to feed), opening (i.e. vacancy); available position, invitation; summons, kind; sort; type, opening (i.e. beginning), counter for mouthfuls, shares (of money), and swords, mouth; speech, counter for people or implements

cards.question: 難しい
cards.meaning: difficult; hard; troublesome; complicated; serious (disease, problem, etc.), fussy; particular; fastidious; hard to please; displeased, gloomy; glum; sullen; serious (look), dirty; unclean; filthy; detestable, unpleasant; uncomfortable; creepy; spooky

cards.question: 閉まる
cards.meaning: to be shut; to close; to be closed, to be locked, to tighten; to be tightened, to become sober; to become tense

cards.question: 妹
cards.meaning: younger sister, darling (only of a woman); dear; honey; my betrothed, one's sister, friend

cards.question: 部屋
cards.meaning: room; chamber, apartment; flat; pad, stable

cards.question: 子
cards.meaning: child, young (animal), young woman; young geisha, offshoot, interest, new shares, player who is not a dealer (in cards, mahjong, etc.)

cards.question: 家
cards.meaning: house; residence; dwelling, family; household, lineage; family name, house; home (one's own), (one's) family; (one's) household

cards.question: 寒い
cards.meaning: cold (e.g. weather), uninteresting (esp. joke); lame; dull; weak; corny

cards.question: 少し
cards.meaning: small quantity; little; few; something, little while, short distance

cards.question: 帰る
cards.meaning: to return; to come home; to go home; to go back, to leave, to get home; to get to home plate

cards.question: 道
cards.meaning: road; street; way; path; course; route; lane, distance; ways (e.g. "a long ways"), the way (of proper conduct, etc.); one's way; morals, teachings (esp. Confucian or Buddhist); dogma, field (of medicine, etc.); subject, way; method; means

cards.question: 忘れる
cards.meaning: to forget; to leave carelessly; to be forgetful of; to forget about; to forget (an article)

cards.question: 忙しい
cards.meaning: busy; occupied; hectic, restless; hurried; fidgety

cards.question: 遅い
cards.meaning: slow, late (e.g. "late at night"), too late, dull; stupid

cards.question: 手
cards.meaning: hand; arm, forepaw; foreleg, handle, hand; worker; help, trouble; care; effort, means; way; trick; move; technique; workmanship, hand; handwriting, kind; type; sort, one's hands; one's possession, ability to cope, hand (of cards), direction, move (in go, shogi, etc.)

cards.question: 走る
cards.meaning: to run, to travel (movement of vehicles); to drive, to hurry to, to retreat (from battle); to take flight, to run away from home, to elope, to tend heavily toward, to flash; to streak; to shoot through (e.g. pain)

cards.question: 買う
cards.meaning: to buy; to purchase, to value; to have a high opinion, to stir; to provoke

cards.question: 言葉
cards.meaning: language; dialect, word; words; phrase; term; expression; remark, speech; (manner of) speaking

cards.question: 春
cards.meaning: spring; springtime, New Year, prime (of one's life, etc.), adolescence; puberty, sexuality

cards.question: 時
cards.meaning: time; hour; moment, occasion; case, chance; opportunity; season, the times; the age; the day, tense

cards.question: 月
cards.meaning: moon, month, month (of the year); used after number or question word (e.g. nan or nani), Monday

cards.question: 言う
cards.meaning: to say; to utter; to declare, to name; to call, to go (e.g. "the alarm went ping"); to make a noise

cards.question: 覚える
cards.meaning: to memorize; to memorise; to commit to memory; to learn by heart; to bear in mind; to remember, to learn; to pick up; to acquire, to feel, to think; to regard

cards.question: 見える
cards.meaning: to be seen; to be in sight, to look; to seem; to appear, to come, to have an audience; to meet; to see, to face (an enemy); to confront, to serve (esp. as one's wife)

cards.question: 歌
cards.meaning: song, classical Japanese poetry (esp. tanka), modern poetry

cards.question: 歌う
cards.meaning: to sing, to sing (one's praises in a poem, etc.); to compose a poem; to recite a poem

cards.question: 止まる
cards.meaning: to stop (moving); to come to a stop, to stop (doing, working, being supplied); to come to a halt; to cease; to be stopped; to be suspended, to alight; to perch on, to remain; to abide; to stay (in the one place), to be limited to; to be confined to, to cease; to stop; to be over

cards.question: 洗う
cards.meaning: to wash; to cleanse; to rinse, to inquire into; investigate, to purify (one's heart), to lave (e.g. shore); to wash over (e.g. deck); to sweep

cards.question: 消える
cards.meaning: to go out; to vanish; to disappear

cards.question: 消す
cards.meaning: to erase; to delete; to cross out, to turn off power, to extinguish; to put out, to bump off

cards.question: 肉
cards.meaning: flesh, meat, the physical body (as opposed to the spirit), thickness, ink pad

cards.question: 犬
cards.meaning: dog (Canis (lupus) familiaris), snoop (i.e. a detective, a spy, etc.), loser; asshole, counterfeit; inferior; useless; wasteful

cards.question: 猫
cards.meaning: cat, shamisen, geisha, wheelbarrow, clay bed-warmer, bottom; submissive partner of a homosexual relationship, cat

cards.question: 生きる
cards.meaning: to live; to exist, to make a living; to subsist, to be in effect; to be in use; to function, to come to life; to be enlivened, to be safe (in baseball, go, etc.)

cards.question: 目
cards.meaning: eye; eyeball, eyesight; sight; vision, look; stare; glance, an experience, viewpoint, stitch; texture; weave, ordinal number suffix, somewhat; -ish, order, item (of a budget revision, etc.), counter for go pieces; counter for surrounded positions (in go)

cards.question: 耳
cards.meaning: ear, hearing, edge; crust, selvedge (non-fray machined edge of fabrics); selvage
